mapper.sql: bank_id, bank_name, subject, description, uploader_id, uploader, question_count, status, reason, upload_time, audit_time, auditor_id, is_shared
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_bank (bank_name, subject, description, uploader_id, uploader, question_count, status, reason, upload_time, audit_time, auditor_id, is_shared) VALUES (#{bankName}, #{subject}, #{description}, #{uploaderId}, #{uploader}, #{questionCount}, #{status}, #{reason}, NOW(), NULL, #{auditorId}, #{isShared})
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_bank SET bank_name = #{bankName}, subject = #{subject}, description = #{description}, uploader_id = #{uploaderId}, uploader = #{uploader}, question_count = #{questionCount}, status = #{status}, reason = #{reason}, audit_time = NOW(), auditor_id = #{auditorId}, is_shared = #{isShared} WHERE bank_id = #{bankId}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM exam_bank WHERE subject = #{subject} ORDER BY upload_time DESC
SELECT FROM exam_bank WHERE uploader_id = #{uploaderId} ORDER BY upload_time DESC
SELECT FROM exam_bank WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY upload_time DESC
